title.narrative: Strengthening the Capacities of the Government of Eswatini to Protect Victims of Trafficking

description.narrative: In Eswatini, a Tier 2 country, the TIP Office proposes to fund some elements of needed renovations of a shelter. The renovated shelter will be the countrys first-ever designated shelter for survivors of trafficking in persons. It is critical for a human trafficking shelter to be established if the Government of Eswatini is to identify and refer victims of trafficking and to prosecute traffickers.
